title: How do I delete or lock a message in a conversation? How do I delete multiple messages in batches?
answer:
[Go to Messaging and touch a conversation to display all messages in the conversation. Touch and hold the message you want to lock. Choose Menu. From the displayed option menu, choose Lock.]() 

 On the Messaging screen, touch and hold the message or conversation you want to delete. From the displayed option menu, choose Delete. You can also touch and hold a message and then select multiple messages or conversations to delete them in batches.
